title: Textile, early 19th century
dimensions: H x W: 41 x 28 cm (16 1/8 in. x 11 in.)
description: Pale blue ground with a background of a small vine pattern reserved in white, possibly by discharge. Overprinted by block in a pattern of flower clusters in red, dark brown and dark green.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, early 19th century.
early 19th century. Medium: cotton
Technique: block printed. Gift of Harold M. Bailey. 1960-79-45.
